text: Maximilian Reinelt (24 August 1988 – 9 February 2019) was a German rower and physician. He won a gold medal at the 2012 Summer Olympics, and a silver medal at the 2016 Summer Olympics. He also won two World Championships and four European Championships. In 2016, he was awarded the Silbernes Lorbeerblatt, Germany's highest sports award. He was born in Ulm, West Germany. Reinelt died on 9 February 2019 during a skiing accident in St. Moritz, Switzerland, aged 30.. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1988 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Skiing deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Germany Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:German doctors Category:German rowers Category:Sportspeople from Baden-Württemberg Category:People from Ulm
title: Maximilian Reinelt
